item.title: Screenshot with Markdown and Vim Using Scrot
item.description: Screenshot with Vim In this post I will show you the easiest way I could come up for taking a screenshots and inserting them to a markdown file while taking notes using Neovim. The title maybe confusing as I couldn’t come up with a shorter title myself. If you could come up with a shorter title please contact me. I came up with this solution (and problem) while I was taking notes through my playing of CTFs and doing pentests.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: My First Post This the first post I have ever made. This another line of my Blog post. source this.sh if [[ $a = 'a' ]] then echo "hello" ls -la elif [[ $a = 'b' ]] then echo "This is b" ls -la / fi
